name: The black necklace of strangulation
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
Know that this is a dangerous item for one who doesn't own it. The
demon inside this necklace wants blood. Only the true owner and the
one who marked the amulet will be spared of his wrath.
